title: The Frog and the Prince
description: Gordon Perry's delightful twist on a classic tale tells the story of the young Prince in a far away land who dreams of finding his perfect Princess. He shares his dream with a cute frog who has romantic dreams of her own.The crafty frog schemes to have the Princess kiss her and make her dreams come true... even if she has to do the kissing. The tale is told in an easy-to-read, fun-to-say, iambic pentimeter sonnet of poetic verse that's perfect for the early reader target market. Lauren Fast's superb full color illustrations add to the magic of the fairytale. Gordon's hilarious picture book will make you think twice before befriending a cute frog with romantic fairytale dreams.The Frog and The Prince has recently received the National Association of Book Entrepreneurs(NABA) Award for "Best Book" in the CHILDREN'S INTEREST Category. The Frog and The Prince is available in Paperback and ebook through http://thefrogandtheprince.com
author: Gordon R. Perry
